item.title: CLF
item.description: score:143 Chances: Cleveland-Cliffs reported record steel shipments in 2023, including record automotive shipments, indicating strong demand for its products The company is focused on aggressive share buybacks, which can lead to increased shareholder value Successful scaling up of clean steel production with hydrogen-fueled blast furnace trial demonstrates commitment to innovation and environmental sustainability Risks: The decision by U.
